DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of the efficacy and safety of T2762 and Vismed® in the treatment of moderate to severe Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of T2762 and Vismed® in Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Signed and dated informed consent Male or female aged from ≥ 18 years old. Known Dry Eye Syndrome requiring artificial tears within the last 3 months prior to study selection. Best far corrected visual acuity < 1/10 Severe blepharitis Severe Dry Eye
